text: Janet Guthrie (born March 7, 1938) is an American former racing driver. She is the first female to qualify and race in either the Indianapolis 500, or the Daytona 500, both of which she competed in during 1977. ==References== ==Other websites== * * nascar.com feature article * Guthrie's career data in NASCAR Category:Living people Category:1938 births Category:NASCAR drivers Category:People from Iowa City, Iowa Category:Sportspeople from Iowa
title: Janet Guthrie
